Prerequisite(s): Three Elemental Flux maneuvers
Range: Melee or ranged attack
Target: One or more creatures (see text)
Duration: Instantaneous

Description

Each slash of your blade releases more and more eldritch power, overwhelming your enemies with the power of your strikes. Make a full attack. Each attack deals damage entirely of your active element's associated energy type, and additional damage equal to [[1d6]] + your initiation modifier. During your full attack, you can change your active element as a free action once after each subsequent attack. Animus augmentation: You may spend two points of animus to make an extra attack during this strike at your highest attack bonus.
